dialogue.pattern: I am here to protect this {town|village}.
Welcome to our {village|town}! How can I help you?
Hail, stranger.
Halt, stranger! State your business!
The plants look funny, especially the {big brown|large reddish} {leafy|leaf-like} things.
Seen any good {pumpkins|apples|squashes} around here?
How are things with you?
See this house? It took me {three weeks| twelve days} to {build this house|this backyard}. And I barely broke a sweat
It's becoming colder around here.
I have fields which need tending to!
Ugh, my house needs to be re-thatched, and I need to collect wood.
I'm a guard in this town. What business do you have here?
You know what smells? [x:animal;locked]{Cows|Chickens|Goats}. But I have to [x:animal;locked]{milk|pick up after|graze} them regularly.
How can all of these {animals|creatures} {defecate|poop} so much?!
My {cows|chickens} {look so {drab|tacky}|have such a {drab|tacky} appearance}. Maybe I can put some {hats|jackets} on them?
Hello! Don't I look fabulous?
{Get away from here|Leave this place}, you {adventurers|weirdos}! I'll use my golden pitchfork on you, I will!
This is a good day. Just smell that fresh air!
Oh, hello there.
Hi, there. Don't mind {if I step on my toes|stub my toe}.
Hail, I'm the owner of a shop.
For {those|patrons|customers} who {require|need} [x:t;locked]{fine|great|wonderful} {goods|services}, I will {provide|sell} them at a [x:t;locked]{fine|great|wonderful} price.
This looks like a good day for pie.
The {hay|trail} rides are going to be fun this {year|season}!
I'm having {a few friends|company} over to celebrate {autumn|the falling leaves}.
I {get up|wake up early}, {eat an egg|down some egg yolks}{, eat a bunch of fresh fruits|, eat some lettuce| }, and have some {whey protein|soy juice}. {I'm|I am} {content|wonderful}!
